r.s: Tool to generate PECL extensions from an XML description
r.d: PECL_Gen (formerly known as ext_skel_ng) is a pure PHP replacement for the ext_skel shell script that comes with the PHP 4 source. It reads in configuration options, function prototypes and code fragments from an XML description file and generates a complete ready-to-compile PECL extension.
r.n: Discontinued in PEAR, PECL_Gen now lives in the PECL repository instead
